system.description: You always have the tools you need to work stone or metal - even types you’ve never seen before - without spending Inventory Points. Additionally, whenever you fill in or erase a segment of a clock related to building, reinforcing, or destroying a structure made of stone, metal, or living wood, you may fill in or erase an additional segment.

Each time you acquire this Skill, learn one Elementalist spell (see next three pages).
Offensive (@ICON[offensive]) Tectonomancer spells use 【INS + WLP】 for the Magic Check.

Trenches collapse and barriers spring up to protect your allies. Your targets cannot be targeted by ranged attacks. Any creature that targets them with a melee attack is considered to be in the trenches. The effect of this spell on a target ends when they make a melee attack against a creature that isn’t in the trenches or otherwise leave its protection (such as by taking flight.)

@LOSS[10 mp] for one target.

@LOSS[20 mp] for two targets.

@LOSS[30 mp] for three targets.

summary.value: I like to think that what we have today was not a gift from the gods.

system.description:
ALSO: Alchemist, Magitech Engineer, Mechanic

Tinkerers possess exceptional ingenuity and are known for their eccentric and marvelous inventions. They travel the world in an endless search for lost theories and ancient machinery, eyes glimmering whenever they witness the wonders of architecture and engineering. In a way, Tinkerers could be seen as the ultimate dreamers and rebels, challenging the very rules of nature and society in their pursuit of a better future.

TINKERER FREE BENEFITS
  • Permanently increase your maximum Inventory Points by 2.
  • You may initiate Projects.

TINKERER SKILLS

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.2MoV74xWJnF5Ru8u]{Emergency Item}

Once per conflict scene, if you are in Crisis, you may perform an additional action on your turn. This action must be the Inventory action.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.0ErPA4Q0P97ZPwPE]{Gadgets} (SL5)

When you first acquire this Skill, choose a gadget type: alchemy, infusions or magitech (see next four pages). You gain its basic benefits.

Whenever you take this Skill again, choose one option: you gain the basic benefits of a new gadget type; or you gain the advanced benefits of a gadget type whose basic benefits you already obtained; or you gain the superior benefits of a gadget type whose advanced benefits you already obtained.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.xzyAHegWwSaysYqV]{Potion Rain} (SL2)

When you create a potion that restores a single creature's HP and/or MP, you may have it affect up to 【SL】 additional creatures. If you do, the potion only restores half the normal amount of HP and MP to each creature.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.S64zqBVdaYA3I5LW]{Secret Formula} (SL5)

When you create a potion or magisphere whose effects restore HP and/or MP, each restored amount is increased by 【SL × 5】.

When you create an elemental shard, potion or magisphere that deals damage, that item deals 【SL】 extra damage.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.6pJAB6E29I15q1gU]{Visionary} (SL5)

When you work on a Project, up to 【SL × 100】 zenit of material costs are automatically paid; additionally, you generate an additional 【SL】 progress every day. If multiple characters with this Skill work on the same Project, the effects will be cumulative.

Inventory Types

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.SsR6UJXT65Q1qNO2]{Gadget - Alchemy}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.1tfYFkiXLuTOUmre]{Gadget - Infusion}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.EmwWSYlFjlUSGPLL]{Gadget- Magitech}

summary.value: Flee to the other end of the world; my arrow shall find you.

system.description:
ALSO: Archer, Gunslinger, Sniper

A majority of Sharpshooters are exceptionally good at dealing with threats from a carefully calculated distance; others are brave, skilled or reckless enough to engage their foes at point-blank. While many of these skilled snipers are battle-hardened soldiers, some have turned to a life of piracy, bounty hunting or banditry. A few have put their abilities at the service of the people, or use them to protect a sacred or forbidden site from intruders.

SHARPSHOOTER FREE BENEFITS
  • Permanently increase your maximum Hit Points by 5.
  • Gain the ability to equip martial ranged weapons and martial shields.

SHARPSHOOTER SKILLS

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.lCFQMCY4AmDsv6sv]{Barrage} (SL5)

When you perform a ranged attack, you may spend 10 Mind Points to choose one option: the attack gains multi (2); or you increase the attack’s multi property by one, up to a maximum of multi (3).

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.sIkQa2NzkqsvczBr]{Crossfire} (SL3)

After a creature you can see performs a ranged attack, you may spend an amount of Mind Points equal to the total Result of their Accuracy Check in order to have the attack fail automatically against all targets. You can only use this Skill if you have a ranged weapon equipped, and it has no effect if the Accuracy Check was a critical success.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.hmDCgX5OEk5l4uXW]{Hawkeye} (SL5)

When you perform the Guard action, if you choose not to provide cover to another creature, you may choose one option: the next ranged attack you perform before the end of the current scene will deal 【SL × 2】 extra damage; or you may immediately perform a free attack with a bow or firearm you have equipped, treating your High Roll (HR) as 0 when calculating damage dealt by this attack.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.0UxTgrag7cE4M1oc]{Ranged Weapon Mastery} (SL4)

You gain a bonus equal to 【SL】 to all Accuracy Checks with ranged weapons.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.Ovmw7cMrN6qvagG4]{Warning Shot} (SL4)

When you hit one or more targets with a ranged attack that would deal damage, you may have the attack deal no damage. If you do, choose one option: inflict shaken on each target hit by the attack; or inflict slow on each target hit by the attack; or each target hit by the attack loses 【SL × 10】 Mind Points. Describe your maneuver!
Automatically equipped in each empty hand slot.

summary.value: One creature suffers 10 damage of a type of your choice (10 Air, 10 Bolt, 10 Earth, 10 Fire, or 10 Ice).

system.description:
For 2 Inventory Points, one creature suffers 10 damage of a type of your choice (air, bolt, earth, fire, or ice).

  • Target Suffers: @DMG[10 air], @DMG[10 bolt], @DMG[10 earth], @DMG[10 fire], or @DMG[10 ice]

summary.value: This allows the entire group to rest in the wilderness and at sea.

system.description: For 4 Inventory Points, this allows the entire group to rest in the wilderness and at sea.
For 3 Inventory Points, one creature recovers @HEAL[50 hp].

summary.value: One creature recovers from a single status effect.

system.description: For 2 Inventory Points, one creature recovers from a single status effect.
For 3 Inventory Points, one creature recovers @HEAL[50 mp].

data.description:
MAGITECH

Also: Engineering, Golemcraft, Robotics.

This invention type grants a variety of different benefits.

MAGITECH OVERRIDE (BASIC)

Add the @UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.aPfawWXZqKuHAAqj]{Magitech Override} feature to your character sheet.

You may use an action and spend @LOSS[10 mp] to perform an Opposed 【INS + INS】 Check against a nearby soldier-rank construct you can see (the Game Master musttell you who is a valid target). If you succeed, you gain control of the creature untilthe end of the scene (the Game Master gives you its profile). You may only control one construct at any given time, but may set it free whenever you want; the construct is also set free as soon as it is harmed by you or by one of your allies. Once free, the construct is again in control of its actions and might turn against you.

MAGICANNON (ADVANCED)

Add the@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.consumables.Item.AbazTRyaMTW4ouhx]{Magicannon (Item)} to your character sheet.

You may perform the Inventory action and spend @LOSS[3 ip] Inventory Points to create a firearm weapon known as a magicannon (see below). The magicannon will crumble to pieces as soon as you use create a new magicannon. When you create a magicannon, choose the type of damage it deals (air, bolt, earth, fire, ice, or physical).

WEAPONACCURACYDAMAGEQUALITIES
Magicannon【DEX + INS】 +1【HR + 10】Two-handed -Ranged -No Quality.

MAGISPHERES (SUPERIOR)

Add three @UUID[Compendium.projectfu.consumables.Item.7dUU12f8IHa2tESo]{Magisphere (Superior)} to your character sheet.

You develop three magisphere prototypes; each of them can replicate a spell chosen from the following lists: Elementalist, Entropist and Spiritist. The spells you choose may come from the same list or different lists.

You also develop two more prototypes upon reaching level 20, and another two upon reaching level 40 (the same applies if you already reached those levels).

You may perform the Inventory action and spend @LOSS[2 ip] to create a magisphere and immediately perform the Spell action for free, casting one ofthe spells you have developed a prototype for. The spell follows the normal rules(including MP costs and Magic Checks) and the magisphere is destroyed upon use.
data.superior:
MAGISPHERES (SUPERIOR)

Add three@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.consumables.Item.7dUU12f8IHa2tESo]{Magisphere (Superior)} to your character sheet.

You develop three magisphere prototypes; each of them can replicate a spell chosen from the following lists: Elementalist, Entropist and Spiritist. The spells you choose may come from the same list or different lists.

You also develop two more prototypes upon reaching level 20, and another two upon reaching level 40 (the same applies if you already reached those levels).

You may perform the Inventory action and spend @LOSS[2 ip] to create a magisphere and immediately perform the Spell action for free, casting one ofthe spells you have developed a prototype for. The spell follows the normal rules(including MP costs and Magic Checks) and the magisphere is destroyed upon use.

The magicannon will crumble to pieces as soon as you use create a new magicannon. When you create a magicannon, choose the type of damage it deals (air, bolt, earth, fire, ice, or physical).

MAGITECH OVERRIDE (BASIC)

Add the @UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.aPfawWXZqKuHAAqj]{Magitech Override} feature to your character sheet.

You may use an action and spend @LOSS[10 mp] to perform an Opposed 【INS + INS】 Check against a nearby soldier-rank construct you can see (the Game Master musttell you who is a valid target). If you succeed, you gain control of the creature untilthe end of the scene (the Game Master gives you its profile). You may only control one construct at any given time, but may set it free whenever you want; the construct is also set free as soon as it is harmed by you or by one of your allies. Once free, the construct is again in control of its actions and might turn against you.

system.description: After a creature you can see performs a ranged attack, you may spend an amount of Mind Points equal to the total Result of their Accuracy Check in order to have the attack fail automatically against all targets. You can only use this Skill if you have a ranged weapon equipped, and it has no effect if the Accuracy Check was a critical success.

When you first acquire this Skill, choose a gadget type: alchemy, infusion, or magitech (see Core Rulebook, page 212). You gain its basic benefits.

Whenever you take this Skill again, choose one option: you gain the basic benefits of a new gadget type; or you gain the advanced benefits of a gadget type whose basic benefits you already obtained; or you gain the superior benefits of a gadget type whose advanced benefits you already obtained.

  • For gadget breakdown and a list of Gadgets, refer to: @UUID[Compendium.projectfu.handouts.JournalEntry.TV4Cj3UI0LWNZaOk]{Gadget Rules}

  • To automate, VTT Instructions can be found here: @UUID[Compendium.projectfu.handouts.JournalEntry.TV4Cj3UI0LWNZaOk.JournalEntryPage.7D5mpbaYddiztH1W]{Gadget VTT Instructions}

summary.value: Create a firearm that deals air, bolt, earth, fire, ice, or physical.

system.description:
Required: Advanced Benefits in @UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.EmwWSYlFjlUSGPLL]{Gadget- Magitech}

For 3 Inventory Points creates a firearm that deals air, bolt, earth, fire, ice, or physical damage. Drag and drop the one you create onto your character sheet.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.consumables.Item.EGvZsEWEhaTqoCgG]{Magicannon (Air)}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.consumables.Item.uuKKqm81klCOiDjO]{Magicannon (Bolt)}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.consumables.Item.sREYRTy6TfK8fe53]{Magicannon (Earth)}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.consumables.Item.jHbcjw8RW9Ywesyu]{Magicannon (Fire)}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.consumables.Item.eVOnHgRLTnL695cP]{Magicannon (Ice)}

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.consumables.Item.MJoIwfTvo0FHcDqL]{Magicannon (Physical)}

ALSO: Earth Mage, Stoneshaper, Terramancer

A Tectonomancer wields magic that manipulates the living earth. Whether they got their start with rocks and dirt or they’re an Elementalist who later specialized, nobody can doubt their expertise now.

Tectonomancy encourages a deliberate, almost ponderous approach to problem-solving, but not all practitioners are willing to take it slow. Those who last the longest recognize that it is best not to be reckless when calling upon such a dreadfully powerful and destructive art. After all, even the mightiest castle needs a foundation to stand on.

TECTONOMANCER FREE BENEFITS

  • Permanently increase your maximum Hit Points by 5.

  • You may perform Rituals whose effects fall within the Elementalism discipline. As long as they work with Earth, Metal or Living Wood.

  • Masterying Tectonomancer qualifies you to take the Powerful Spell Heroic Skills.

TECTONOMANCER SKILLS

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.zh4aSUXfN0gddzJj]{Earthmeld} (SL2)

At 【SL 1】 you have the ability to move through solid stone and dirt without disturbing it. If solid ground is available, you may use an action and spend 1 Fabula Point to sink into it to take cover for the rest of a scene. You will have to emerge from the earth nearby.

At 【SL 2】 you can take willing creatures with you a short distance - through a wall or rockfall, for instance. (If you release a creature, the magic launches them to the surface in an unpredictable direction; you can’t trap them, though you could try this as an unconventional travel method.)

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.xp1Csz7LczIW8Zoc]{Tectonomancy} (SL10)

Each time you acquire this Skill, learn one Elementalist spell (see next three pages).
Offensive (@ICON[offensive]) Tectonomancer spells use 【INS + WLP】 for the Magic Check.

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.iWV0UGI9HiDPfmVa]{Mineral Spirit}

When you use the Inventory action to create a Tonic, the creature that drinks it recovers from all status effects, instead of just one.

Note: for the love of Bahamut, do not actually drink mineral spirits!

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.DHavgDFfytd17Ze3]{Solid Path} (SL3)

You are immune to environmental effects that would affect you via dangerous ground (for example, marshy ground inflicting slow or unstable footing filling a clock towards an avalanche.)

The GM is the final arbiter on what counts. You may extend this benefit to other creatures for the rest of a scene by spending 【20 - (5 × SL)】MP for each creature.

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.mbuSMM9ZMFdoddEK]{Stonework}

You always have the tools you need to work stone or metal - even types you’ve never seen before - without spending Inventory Points. Additionally, whenever you fill in or erase a segment of a clock related to building, reinforcing, or destroying a structure made of stone, metal, or living wood, you may fill in or erase an additional segment.

TECHTONOMANCER SPELLS

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-handouts.JournalEntry.k7ZTC2cfSI9wgASF]{Tectonomancer Rules}

HEROIC SKILLS

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-heroic-skills.Item.mMxNkLHUnIjwXVT5]{Cat 10}

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-heroic-skills.Item.VPqEtc9VTVeQXy10]{Geoswimmer}

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-heroic-skills.Item.oWAM9jhnAIXbbHRT]{Legendary Metal}

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-heroic-skills.Item.DBUmTrx8USXsGz9q]{Lithommancy}
